import sys
import math
test=int(input())
while test>0:
    test-=1
    arr=map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
    k=int(raw_input())
    arr.sort()
    n=arr[-k]
    cnt=arr.count(n)
    y=arr[-k:]
    cnt2=y.count(n)
    temp=long(math.factorial(cnt))/(math.factorial(cnt-cnt2)*(math.factorial(cnt2)))
    print temp
